news.title: Reliance unveils $110B AI investment plan as India ramps up tech ambitions
news.summary: Reliance has begun building multi-gigawatt AI data centers in Jamnagar, with more than 120 MW of capacity expected to come online in 2026.

news.title: Etsy sells secondhand clothing marketplace Depop to eBay for $1.2B
news.summary: The deal comes nearly five years after Etsy purchased Depop for $1.62 billion, at a time when secondhand clothing apps were gaining traction during the pandemic.
